trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit custom properties on an associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control.
trans-unit.target: 提供編輯器控制項，可讓使用者編輯關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或伺服器控制項上的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> provides a generic user interface (UI) that enables users to edit custom properties on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and server controls placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>提供一般的使用者介面 (UI)，可讓使用者在編輯自訂內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>伺服器控制項放在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> controls, edit only existing, UI-oriented properties from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>控制項、 編輯現有的僅、 UI 導向屬性從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別。

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls, and each of these must reside in a corresponding type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: 就像 Web 組件控制項集合中有工具導向的區域 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>類別概觀) 有工具導向組件的控制項，其中每一項都必須位於工具區域的對應型別。

trans-unit.source: These kind of controls in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics:
trans-unit.target: 這些類型的 Web 組件控制項集合中的控制項有兩個特殊的特性：

trans-unit.source: They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize the controls that form the primary UI of a page in a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: 是讓終端使用者個人化 Web 組件的應用程式中形成主頁面的 UI 控制項的協助程式控制項。

trans-unit.source: They are visible only in certain page display modes.
trans-unit.target: 它們只會中顯示特定網頁顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control is a special control, and it becomes visible only when a Web page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control has been selected by a user for editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項是特殊的控制項，並只有在網頁上處於編輯模式，且時特定變成可見<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或編輯伺服器控制項選取的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, must reside in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項，如同所有其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項都必須位於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>頁面上的區域。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>只能包含區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項不能放在任何其他類型的區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control provides an editing UI for properties that are marked in the source code with the `WebBrowsable` attribute (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebBrowsableAttribute> class).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項的標記與原始程式碼中的屬性提供編輯的 UI`WebBrowsable`屬性 (從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebBrowsableAttribute>類別)。

trans-unit.source: When a property is marked with this attribute, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control creates the editing UI based on the type of the property, and uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> object if needed to convert the value in each editing control to the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性，以標記的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>建立根據屬性的類型的編輯 UI 控制項，並使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>物件，如果需要將每個編輯控制項中的值轉換成屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: You can also add other attributes that help the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control to display the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以加入其他屬性可幫助<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>来顯示的編輯 UI 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The `WebDisplayName` attribute (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDisplayNameAttribute> class) allows you to specify the text for the label that appears with each control in the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: `WebDisplayName`屬性 (從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDisplayNameAttribute>類別) 可讓您指定與每個控制項的編輯 UI 中出現的標籤的文字。

trans-unit.source: The `WebDescription` attribute (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute> class) allows you to specify a string that appears as a ToolTip for each control in the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: `WebDescription`屬性 (從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute>類別) 可讓您指定為編輯的 UI 中的每個控制項的工具提示顯示的字串。

trans-unit.source: The controls created to edit properties of various types are listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中所編輯的各種類型的屬性建立的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Property type
trans-unit.target: 屬性類型

trans-unit.source: Control created to edit the property
trans-unit.target: 若要編輯的屬性建立控制項

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Int, Float, Unit
trans-unit.target: Int、 Float、 單位

trans-unit.source: Boolean
trans-unit.target: Boolean

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> (contains the list of enumerated values)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> （包含列舉值的清單）

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> class has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A> property, which is used to get or set the visible title text for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>類別具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性，用來取得或設定控制項的可見的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: There is also a protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Display%2A> property, which determines whether the control is displayed when the page enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 沒有也受保護<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Display%2A>屬性，決定頁面進入編輯模式時，是否顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> class also has two important methods, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>類別也有兩個重要的方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>，它繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>類別並覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited.
trans-unit.target: 方法非常重要，因為它們可讓取得和設定的編輯器控制項的欄位值和屬性之間的屬性值上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制所編輯。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control allows you to edit only custom properties, you will need the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in the Web Parts control set to edit the appearance, layout, and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項可讓您編輯自訂的屬性，您需要其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>中若要編輯的外觀、 配置和行為設定的 Web 組件控制項的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The other controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>、 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but if necessary, you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 這些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項應該提供編輯所需的大部分編輯功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，但如果有必要，您也可以建立自訂編輯器控制項繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>類別。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: To improve accessibility, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要改善存取範圍，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>內呈現控制項`<fieldset>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: `<fieldset>`項目群組的一組相關的使用中進行編輯的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項，以及它協助視覺化使用者代理程式 （例如一般的網頁瀏覽器） 和語音導向使用者代理程式 （在這些控制項之間的索引標籤式瀏覽例如，螢幕讀取軟體）。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此控制項呈現標記可能不符合協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declare a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制在網頁上，並讓它編輯有幾項 UI 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control, along with a reference to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 網頁包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項，以及自訂的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A class that contains the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含自訂的類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The source code for the user control comes from another topic.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。

trans-unit.source: For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example.
trans-unit.target: 對於程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要取得的使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在.aspx 頁面，在此程式碼範例中的相同資料夾中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: It contains a declarative reference to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, with a child `<zonetemplate>` element that contains a declarative reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 它包含的宣告式參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控制項和子系`<zonetemplate>`包含的宣告式參考的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The page references the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `<aspSample:UserInfoWebPart>` element for the control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面參考自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，請使用`Register`指示詞的組件，而`<aspSample:UserInfoWebPart>`控制項項目。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class named `UserInfoWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分是自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>名為類別`UserInfoWebPart`，參考網頁中。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the various properties that contain information about a user are all marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，包含使用者資訊的各種屬性都標記為`WebBrowsable`屬性。

trans-unit.source: This enables the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control to provide the UI for editing those properties.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>提供編輯這些屬性的 UI 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The properties are also marked with a `WebDisplayName` attribute, to specify the text of the label that appears next to each control in the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: 屬性也會標示`WebDisplayName`屬性，以指定的編輯 UI 中的每個控制項旁出現的標籤文字。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to edit the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**使用者資訊 WebPart**控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**，編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the editing UI is visible, you can see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示編輯的 UI 時，您可以看到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Notice that a control is rendered for each of the properties of the `UserInfoWebPart` class, based on the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，針對每個屬性的轉譯控制項`UserInfoWebPart`類別，根據屬性的類型。

trans-unit.source: If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您進行一些變更中編輯 UI 按一下**套用** 按鈕，您可以使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式，並查看完整的編輯變更影響的下拉式清單。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 建立類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.%23ctor%2A>建構函式是預設值，則沒有建構函式宣告中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>類別，因此沒有特殊的工作會執行建立類別的新執行個體時。

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart" /> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將值從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart" /> 控制項儲存至相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項中相應的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the action of saving values from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果將值從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart" /> 儲存至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 的動作順利進行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則 (如果發生錯誤) 為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法是關鍵的方法上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The method saves the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 方法會將儲存的使用者已設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>中相關聯的對應屬性的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在參考相關聯的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項的繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> type is sealed to prevent inheriting from it.
trans-unit.target: 您無法覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>型別密封格式，以防止繼承自它。

trans-unit.source: However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control provides, you can create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control and provide your own implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您需要編輯不同的程序需以程式設計方式控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制屬性比<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>提供控制項，您可以建立自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制，並提供這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method attempts to set the values on public custom properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, provided that those properties each have a `[WebBrowsable(true)]` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法會嘗試在公用中相關聯的自訂屬性上設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，前提是這些屬性每個都有`[WebBrowsable(true)]`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法在使用者按一下按鈕，表示確定或編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 中套用動詞命令時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: You can also call it directly from your own code if there is a need to save the edited values apart from user actions.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以呼叫它直接從您自己的程式碼是否需要儲存的編輯的值除了使用者動作。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試為相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 上的屬性設定值時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫繼承自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> 控制項的基底屬性，並從設計工具隱藏該屬性，防止它受主題的影響。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button" /> control that receives the default focus in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含收到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button" /> 控制項中預設焦點之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> 控制項的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: 雖然它是公用的，但這個屬性僅用於此控制項的預設呈現，而不可以從開發人員程式碼進行呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出當與控制項相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項處於編輯模式時，是否應該顯示該控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否應該顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Display%2A> property returns `false` if the value on the base property is also `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Display%2A>屬性會傳回`false`如果基底屬性的值也是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the control to be edited is not `null`, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果要編輯的控制項不是`null`，然後在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Display%2A> property applies only when a page is in edit mode, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Display%2A>屬性適用於僅當頁面處於編輯模式和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>已選取要編輯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values from a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control, and updates the corresponding controls used to edit those property values within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項擷取值，並更新用於編輯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart" /> 控制項中那些屬性值的相應控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法是關鍵的方法上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: 它會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>基底類別的方法會擷取目前的值從相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，然後更新中的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>具有這些值，讓使用者編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法呼叫時中相關聯的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項可能已變更。

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>區域，其中包含控制呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法後立即呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法，使中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項一律會同步處理中的值相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Another case where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 另一種情況其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法呼叫時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項進入編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定編輯器控制項的標題。

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: 做為控制項標題的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 Web 組件控制項集合所提供的計算控制項名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A> property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性值會顯示在標題列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制控制項時顯示在編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 控制項在頁面中宣告時，您可以設定的值`Title`屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未提供標題的值，提供特定文化特性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A> property overrides the base property so that, if no title value is supplied, a default title appropriate to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control can be supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性覆寫基底屬性，因此，如果沒有提供任何標題值，預設值標題適合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項可以提供的 Web 組件控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: This code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the title on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control declaratively in a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何在設定標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>以宣告方式在網頁中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The next part of the code example shows how to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下一個部分的程式碼範例示範如何設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: In order to persist the programmatically assigned value, a static variable named `editControlTitle` is used, and this value is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A> property each time the control is initialized, so that the value is persisted between postback events.
trans-unit.target: 以保存以程式設計的方式指派的值，靜態變數命名為`editControlTitle`使用時，這個值會指派給和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性初始化的控制項，如此回傳事件之間的值會保存每次。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing.
trans-unit.target: 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**使用者資訊 WebPart**控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**開始編輯。

trans-unit.source: When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control, and a button and text box positioned above it.
trans-unit.target: 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項，以及位於其上方的按鈕和文字方塊的方塊。

trans-unit.source: Note that the title of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control is the value assigned to it in the declarative markup of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項是在網頁上的宣告式標記指派給它的值。

trans-unit.source: If you enter some text in the text box next to the **Update EditorPart Title** button, and then click the button, the title for the control is updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果您輸入一些文字在文字方塊旁邊**更新 EditorPart 標題**按鈕，然後再按一下按鈕標題的控制項也會更新。
